subject: RE: [junit] Websphere Connection Pool
msgSnippet: Write a provider that wraps the pool, mock the provider, and away you go. =jason [:question | ^One] ... From: clairegknowles
messageBody:
Write a provider that wraps the pool, mock the provider, and away you
go.

=jason
[:question | ^One]

-----Original Message-----
From: clairegknowles <mail@...>
[mailto:mail@...]
Sent: Friday, January 24, 2003 5:08 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Websphere Connection Pool


I am currently writing a web application which uses the Websphere
connection pool. I can write tests for the rest of my applciation,
how to I test connections to the db, and objects which use the db
connections without having to run the websphere server?

Thanks

Claire
